Reviews.Title: “Efficient /clean/friendly....but in the heart of London”
Reviews.Author: RonNYC
Reviews.Content: gower house hotel located bloomsbury hotel undergoing remodelling hinder stay staff friendly helpful expecting clean ideally located walking distance central portion london clean size double breakfast ordinary location tube goodge nice atmosphere worthwhile

Reviews.Title: “this place is a dump - unsanitary”
Reviews.Author: nenaghgirl
Reviews.Content: low expectations previous reviews expect amount cleanliness lacking dirty stained carpets vacuumed im pretty found dried animal droppings sort corner tired worn dingy beds terrible sloping feel springs pressing night worst element waking bug bites unknown origin immigrant staff helpful ones charge unfortunately warned hotel scheduled remodeled wasnt expecting decent standard cleanliness care guest lacking checked 2 nights thankful

Reviews.Title: “Nice experience”
Reviews.Author: DanaToronto_Canada
Reviews.Content: hotel staff ready extra mile location excellent tube near specially british museum walking distance building bathrooms otherwise comfortable fairly clean yard size daily english breakfast simple service prompt friendly day tv didnt matter considering price value money

Reviews.Title: “Great location, price and staff - OK if you don't expect too much”
Reviews.Author: PinkWellies
Reviews.Content: stayed gower house hotel nights april 2011 single shared facilities top floor building location fantastic short walk euston station central london price low central london â£55 pn single staff excellent friendly helpful competent standard english requested quieter booking hotel indeed nice quiet night staff promptly replaced lightbulb shower cupboard top floor installed roll toilet paper toilet top floor soon notified matters free wifi internet available throughout hotel bedrooms shabby particularly clean probably adequate shared toilet top floor tiny cupboard person probably able shared facilities floors space pillow bed spare pillow blanket provided chambermaid provided pillow requested found strange thin initially provided am ablebodied noted definitely hotel lift breakfast served basement trek third usa fourth floor basement workout fellow guest told hotel process rebranded prince gower hotel indeed staff sporting sweatshirts name apparently include complete refurbishing improve near future central hotel fine people budget arent fussy

Reviews.Title: “Good location, professionally run, good price”
Reviews.Author: danlev
Reviews.Content: class morgan hotel left night noisy gower house hotel quiet double 85 pounds night situated block tottenham court road goodge street tube stop included breakfast management professional recommended

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet & Ideal for laying down your head.”

Reviews.Content: found hotel ideal value money planning busy sightseeing holiday decor refreshingly retro impress love life try savoy staff helpful intrusive hesitate recommend

Reviews.Title: “Basic, old and cramped”
Reviews.Author: hxdirect
Reviews.Content: hotel location touring london basic booked family 3 ourselves 2 daughters rate size double bed 2 single beds added couldnt swing mouse cat 1 single beds plonked front fireplace centre wall items furniture shoehorned rickety pine wardrobe 2 chairs table cramped luggage found relatively clean tidy wasnt lot floorspace mess ensuite facilities visit kim remove ancient limescale mould shower tray springy underfoot worn white enamel disappeared allowing black underneath basic accommodation location london means stay refurbishment time visit london try book elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Great Location , Very Good Choice for Budget Hotel”

Reviews.Content: base london trip close 3 tube stops 12 block useful bus stop steps british museum fancy clean comfortable pleasant hosts aware gower st busy road street noise evenings ok cool night windows closed wifi sporadically
